Piazza Links Options

Piazza Options

Choose your default Piazza class.
When you search for a post number (@<post #>) in the URL bar, you will be redirected to the post on this Piazza site.

Other options

Convert @<post> website text to hyperlinks
Example: @6
REQUIRES: Network ID (in Piazza Options above) should be set.
Redirect Omnibox queries with @<post> to search
Example: Open a new tab, type @6 in the URL bar, and press Enter.
REQUIRES: Network ID (in Piazza Options above) should be set.
